short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a demo to discover the possibilities of a Starmind browser extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension currently renders a Starmind Logo in the lower right corner with a direct link to the Starmind Network. 

This is just a first test to discover additional possibilities and user problems that could be addressed through a browser extension.
